Here is the list of signs at $line, along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Aries is a great leader, but can be impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Taurus is reliable and practical, but can be stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Gemini is quick-witted and adaptable, but can be flighty and unreliable.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Cancer is emotional and nurturing, but can be moody and clingy.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Leo is confident and charismatic, but can be arrogant and attention-seeking.
6. Virgo - 8/10 - Virgo is analytical and hardworking, but can be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 7/10 - Libra is diplomatic and social, but can be indecisive and overly concerned with appearances.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Scorpio is intense and passionate, but can be secretive and manipulative.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Sagittarius is adventurous and optimistic, but can be blunt and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Capricorn is responsible and ambitious, but can be rigid and emotionally closed-off.
11. Aquarius - 7/10 - Aquarius is independent and humanitarian, but can be detached and unpredictable.
12. Pisces - 5/10 - Pisces is empathetic and imaginative, but can be escapist and unclear about boundaries.
Note: These scores are subjective and based on general astrological interpretations.
